com.amazonaws.amplify.auth

Interface AdvancedSignInProvider


  • public interface AdvancedSignInProvider
    Provides more functionality than the basic SignInProvider.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changePassword()
      Change user password.
      void confirmForgotPassword()
      Provides confirmations such as code sent by SMS, email, or token.
      void confirmMFA()
      Provide MFA code to service.
      void confirmSignUp()
      Provides confirmations such as code sent by SMS, email, or token.
      void forgotPassword()
      Initiates the forgot password process.
      void setMFAType()
      Sets what MFA method user will use.
      void signUp()
      Initiates the sign up process.
